question: The sodium fusion extract is boiled with concentrated nitric acid while testing for halogens. By doing so, it
choices: increases the concentration of NO3- ion
decomposes Na2S and NaCN, if formed
explanation: Boiling with conc. HNO3 decomposes sodium cyanide (NaCN) and sodium sulphide (Na2S) to prevent them from interfering with the silver nitrate test for halogens [cite: 710-718].
